== Parcem (CT) (626660) ==

Parcem (CT) is a town in the [[PERNEM]] taluka of [[NORTH GOA]] district with an area of 10.44 sq. km. and harbouring 1030 households with total population of 4627 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 28 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 28 km. Male population is 2345 and female population is 2282. Scheduled Caste population is 188 and Scheduled Tribes population is 11. Census Location Code of the town is 626660<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class VI (population_total < 5,000).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 147 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 459 km. Railway station is at PERNEM at a distance of 12 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 70 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at PERNEM (9 km) .
